snippet: The conservative talk show host, Glenn Beck, is taking his show, TheBlaze TV, to the satellite television network and plans for it to be available on cable TV, too.
abstract: Glenn Beck is repositioning his conservative talk show TheBlaze TV as an offering for cable and satellite operators one year after embracing an Internet-only distribution model; agreement with Dish Network is first of what his company hopes will be many such deals; TheBlaze TV will remain available via the Web for its 300,000 paying subscribers.
lead_paragraph: The conservative talk show host, Glenn Beck, is taking his show, TheBlaze TV, to the satellite television network and plans for it to be available on cable TV, too.

headline.seo: Glenn Beck’s Show Heads to Dish Network
headline.main: Beck Takes His Conservative Internet Shows to the Dish Network
headline.print_headline: Beck Is Taking His Conservative Internet Shows to the Dish Network
